Myrtle Irene Curran

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: William A. Johnson
  3. Location of Family: Auburn, NE
  4. Sending Organization: n/a
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: Unknown
  7. Date of Birth: 1902-10-15, Milwaukee, WI
  8. Date of Death: 1939
  9. Gender: female
  10. Notes: In 1910, William H. and Lillie B. Johnson lived in Lincoln County, NE, with their adopted daughter Myrtle Curran, who was born in Wisconsin ca. 1903. See 1910 census, Plant Precinct, Lincoln Co., NE, 6B.
  11. Source: National Orphan Train Complex
